word_mean: ［法］冲洗或灌洗一个器官，如胃

sentence.Network_en: Give him a gastric lavage immediatly and then give him the antidote.
sentence.Network_cn: 立即给他洗胃,然后给他解毒药.

sentence.Network_en: Bronchoalveolar lavage is the best treatment up to now.
sentence.Network_cn: 最常用之治疗方法是气管肺泡灌冲法.

sentence.Network_en: A proportion of subjects with negative smear results underwent bronchoalveolar lavage.
sentence.Network_cn: 一部分受试者的阴性涂片结果行支气管肺泡灌洗.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent. (in the general sense 'washing, a wash'): from French, from laver 'to wash'

means.word_mean: 1. washing out a hollow organ (especially the stomach) by flushing with water
